errors.articles: Keine Artikel verfügbar. Bitte versuchen Sie es später noch einmal.

about.title: About Us
about.start: We are five programmers and together we have built this news site - modern, simple and informative.
about.kontakt: Contact us via the contact page!
about.text: Our project idea was to create a website where you can view the most important recent news. For this, we used the Newsdata.io API to fetch and display the news.
